text.div:
PhPID Active Substance Stratum Level 1

This value set provide an example of possible codes representing PhPID Active Substance Stratum Level 1. PhPID Lvl1 identifies the substance(s) in the medication product. It is envisioned that IDMP PhPIDs will be used in the next future.

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://www.nlm.nih.gov/research/umls/rxnorm
    CodeDisplay
    723Amoxicillin
  • Include these codes as defined in http://www.nlm.nih.gov/research/umls/rxnorm
    CodeDisplay
    19711'Amoxicillin / Clavulanate

name: Pharmaceutical Products (Lvl 1)
title: PhPID Active Substance Stratum Level 1
description: This value set provide an example of possible codes representing PhPID Active Substance Stratum Level 1. PhPID Lvl1 identifies the substance(s) in the medication product. It is envisioned that IDMP PhPIDs will be used in the next future.
